get.summary: Know if the contract has been read or not
get.description: Returns read status of the contract

post.description: Search the existing contracts based on dateOfAward, Contract amount range, and winning Company

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: navigate to a specific page in results

requestBody.description: Search Parameters, you can use 1 or more search parameters

dateOfAward.description: the date when the contract was awarded

example: The date of award field is required when none of from contract amount / winning company are present.
The date of award is not a valid date.
The winning company field is required when none of from contract amount / date of award are present.
The from contract amount must be a number
The from contract amount field is required when to contract amount is present
The to contract amount must be a number
The to contract amount field is required when from contract amount is present

post.description: Register to begin using the platform

example: The email must be a valid email address.
The email has already been taken.
The password must be at least 6 characters.
The name must be at least 6 characters.

message.example: Successfully created account. You can now request for token

post.description: Get Token to use on api by supplying email, password

example: The email must be a valid email address.

401.description: Returns when user is not authenticated
